boardgame.name: Les Aventuriers du Rail: Édition Märklin
Ticket to Ride: Maerklin Edition
Ticket to Ride: Märklin
Zug um Zug: Märklin
boardgame.description: Ticket to Ride: M_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;auml;rklin is the third installment in Days of Wonder's best-selling Ticket to Ride series. The board for M_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;auml;rklin is based on a map of Germany and each individual card in the deck depicts a different M_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;auml;rklin Trains model. A DVD introducing players to the M_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;auml;rklin line of model trains is included [Edit: DVD no longer included in recent runs.]_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;M_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;auml;rklin is a heavier version in the TTR series, allowing players to not only travel from city to city but also from cities to countries. A new mechanic is also introduced in the form of passengers and merchandise tokens. When the game is set-up a series of merchandise values worth victory points are placed on nominated cities. The values of these tokens diminish when multiple tokens are present within a single city, requiring players to move quickly to capture the higher valued tokens._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;These tokens can be collected by the players by placing their Passengers (3 per player), which can be achieved at the end of a turn in which a player lays trains to enter the city in question. Once a passenger is in play a player can forfeit their regular turn to move a passenger. Moving along a player's own train network comes at no cost and allows a player to take the top merchandise token from each city that is passed through. A passenger can also move along sections of track featuring other players trains but a passenger card must be paid each time this occurs to do so._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The player who completes the most destination tickets receives a 10 point bonus (instead of the base game's longest route bonus)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Please see my eBay feedback if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like: My username is gabeschw, and I currently have a feedback score of over 250 with 100% positive reviews. Shipping (to U.S. only) by Priority Mail is $10. I greatly prefer Paypal, but will take a money order as well.

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 7 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: Preferred payment is PayPal, but will accept cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s checks or money orders. I DO NOT accept personal checks. If you choose to pay by cashier check or money order, please include item number. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.

Days of Wonder - Ticket To Ride: Marklin Collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Edition Language: English Players: 2 to 5 Age: 8+ Duration: 30 to 60 min Weight: 1.600 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: Ticket to Ride - Märklin Edition is the third installment in Days of Wonder_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s best-selling Ticket to Ride series. The board for the Märklin Edition is based on a map of Germany and each individual card in the deck depicts a different Märklin Trains model. A DVD introducing players to the Märklin line of model trains is included. Passenger figures are used to pick up merchandise tokens worth different numbers of points along the routes that they claim. The player who completes the most destination tickets receives a 10 point bonus (instead of the base game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s longest route bonus). See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

Days of Wonder (DOW7205) Ticket to Ride - Märklin Edition is the third installment in Days of Wonder_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s best-selling boardgame series that has won 14 international game awards, including the prestigious Spiel des Jahres. The boardmap for the Märklin Edition is based on a map of Germany and introduces a new gameplay element where players can use passengers to pick up merchandise worth different numbers of points along the routes that they claim. However, the game will remain as simple to learn and teach as the previous versions. Those of you who know the train hobby are likely to be familiar with the Märklin name. This German company has been around for over 140 years and is the world_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s leader in the miniature train hobby. The Märklin Edition of Ticket to Ride marries the best of the model train and board gaming worlds. Each train card in this edition will feature a different image (118 in all) of a Märklin model train car or locomotive.
New in shrinkwrap.
